alert.note: Alert for Coastal Horry (South Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Wilmington (Northeastern South Carolina and Southeastern North Carolina - Wilmington)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 07 at 4:06PM EDT by NWS Wilmington
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Horry County through 445 PM EDT... At 406 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Myrtle Beach, moving east at 5 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Myrtle Beach, North Myrtle Beach, Myrtle Beach Airport, Springmaid Pier, North Myrtle Beach Airport, Socastee, Forestbrook, Barefoot Landing Area Of North Myrtle Beach, Briarcliffe Acres, Atlantic Beach and Grand Strand Regional Medical Center. This includes SC Highway 31 between mile markers 6 and 16. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
